info.title: Ice cream market.

post.description: Endpoint to add a new Member to the system.

example.message: name must be a string and not empty

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page to list members

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many members to return per page

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Order by some field table

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter members by some fields table
parameters.example: name:like:some text here,id:some id here,price:gt:1000,amount:lt:5,createdAt:egt:some date ISO

get.description: Retrieve a list of members based on optional query parameters.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: ids of members to delete

delete.description: Delete members based on ids query parameter.

parameters.description: ID of the Member to retrieve

parameters.description: ID of the User that is a Member to retrieve
